Description: Magical gem; intaglio; blue glass paste; oval; bevelled edge; engraved on the obverse: pantheos with jackal-head feet, lion-head knees, bird tail, scorpion tail, two pairs of wings and crown of Upper Egypt holding long staff; inscribed.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (167)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (565) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/565)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G542 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.10014 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
